Package it.polimi.ingsw.event.viewcontrollerevent

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionChoiceEvent
    Event for the choice of the action by a player
    CardChoiceEvent
    Message to notify the controller about a generic card choice
    CharacterChoiceEvent
    Event used to notify the character choice by the player
    DisconnectedEvent
    Message to notify the client about a player disconnection
    EndRoundPowerUpChoiceEvent
    Message to notify the controller about the choice of end-round powerUps
    GameChoiceEvent
    Represent the User preferences about map before a new game initialization Map coding is: 0: Big left, Big right (bigger) 1: Big left, Small right (medium1) 2: Small left, Big right (medium2) 3: Small left, Small right (smaller)
    GenericPayChoiceEvent
    Message sent by the player to notify his choice about a generic payment
    GrabChoiceEvent
    Message to notify the controller about the grab square choice of a player
    MoveChoiceEvent
    Message to notify the controller about the move choice of a player
    NewtonPlayerTargetChoiceEvent
    Message to notify the target choice of a Newton powerUp
    PositionChoiceEvent
    Message to notify a generic position choice by the player
    PowerUpChoiceEvent
    Message to notify the choice of a powerUp as an action
    PowerUpListChoiceEvent
    Message to notify a generic choice of many powerUps
    PowerUpSquareTargetChoiceEvent
    Message to notify the choice of a taarget square for the as action powerUps
    ReconnectedEvent
    Message to notify the reconnection of a player
    ShotMoveChoiceEvent
    Message to notify the move choice before a shot action
    SkipActionChoiceEvent
    Message sent by a player to skip the current action
    SpawnChoiceEvent
    Message sent to notify the position choice for the respawn
    TargetingScopeTargetChoiceEvent
    Message for the targeting scope target choice
    UpdateChoiceEvent
    Notify the update of the client
    ViewControllerEvent
    Generic message sent by a player to the controller to notify his choice about a request
    WeaponChoiceEvent
    Message for the shot weapon choice
    WeaponDiscardChoiceEvent
    Message to notify the weapon to discard
    WeaponEffectChioceEvent
    Message to notify the effect choice
    WeaponEffectPaymentChoiceEvent
    Message to notify the chosen powerUp to pay an effect
    WeaponGrabChoiceEvent
    Message to notify the weapon grab choice
    WeaponGrabPaymentChoiceEvent
    Message to notify the choice for the pay of the weapon grab
    WeaponPlayersTargetChoiceEvent
    Message to notify the player target choice for weapons effect
    WeaponReloadChoiceEvent
    Notify the weapon to reload
    WeaponReloadPaymentChoiceEvent
    notify the weapon reload choice
    WeaponSquareTargetChoiceEvent
    Notify the target of a effect
    WhileActionPowerUpChoiceEvent
    Notify the choosen while action powerUps
